class.name: RectangleShape2D
class.brief_description: A 2D rectangle shape used for physics collision.
class.description: A 2D rectangle shape, intended for use in physics. Usually used to provide a shape for a [CollisionShape2D]. [b]Performance:[/b] [RectangleShape2D] is fast to check collisions against. It is faster than [CapsuleShape2D], but slower than [CircleShape2D].
